item.title: Run Python regularly with Heroku Scheduler
item.description: #Run Python regularly with Heroku Scheduler Perform Python periodically with Heroku Scheduler -Introduction -Purpose -Related Article -Execution environment -Source Code -Scenario and Assumptions -Preparation -Create FX Rate API -Scheduler setup -Scheduler Registration Introduction This article is for Mac environment, but the procedure is the same for Windows environment. Please read the environment-dependent part and try again. Purpose After reading this article, you’ll be able to: Run Python regularly with Heroku Scheduler Scheduler settings

item.title: I want to upload the Django app to heroku
item.description: Thank you for your help. 【environment】 Surface Laptop2 Windows 1809 Python 3.7.4 (the one running on the command line) Django 2.2.6 [What you want to achieve] I want to publish an app made with Django using heroku 【Situation】 The Django app on Heroku doesn’t deploy well and the build doesn’t succeed. Procedure (1) https://qiita.com/frosty/items/66f5dff8fc723387108c Https://qiita.com/RyuSA/items/0cbc7d5b0145585861a8 I rewrote settings.py with reference to the two sites Was rewritten as from socket import gethostname # It is possible to get the hostname by doing this ***A import django_heroku import os import dj_database_url
